metadata.title: CVE-2018-1285 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache log4net versions before 2.0.10 do not disable XML external entitieswhen parsing log4net configuration files. This allows for XXE-based attacksin applications that accept attacker-controlled log4net configurationfiles.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblog4net1.2-cil - 1.2.10+dfsg-7ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: log4net package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.10+dfsg-7ubuntu0.18.04.1').
